people.name: Michael Kunst
bio: Michael took the helm of the business in April 2024, having previously been Chief Strategy Officer.

He joined from Philip Morris International, where he held several positions of increasing responsibility, including Senior Vice President, Commercialization. He was previously a Senior Partner at management consulting firm, Bain & Company.
He has decades of experience within the pharmaceutical and consumer health industries in commercial strategy, and has a deep understanding of consumer, physician, payor, and patient perspectives.
Michael has a Bachelor's and Master's degree in Business Administration from European Business School in Germany.

people.name: Karine Tasli
bio: Prior to her appointment as Director Strategic Initiatives, Karine held various roles in driving organizational change and business transformation at Philip Morris International and Kearney.
She brings more than 15 years of experience in corporate strategy, transformation, mergers and acquisition, and business development.
Karine holds an MBA from ESCP Business School, France, and a Master's degree in Life Sciences Engineering from AgroParisTech, France.
